channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large quantities of bird faeces, 17th April
item.description:
On the pavement/promenade opposite the war memorial in Abbey terrace. The faeces runs the length of the promenade and constitutes a health hazard to the general public. Let's not wait until people get ill. Thank you for your time.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbey Terrace, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet
